member.name: T:pkd_config_service.ConfigurationService
member.summary: Class for loading configuration data from a JSON file.
member.remarks: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The program slot number to search for when loading configuration.

member.name: M:pkd_config_service.ConfigurationService.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Class for loading configuration data from a JSON file.
member.remarks: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The program slot number to search for when loading configuration.

member.name: E:pkd_config_service.ConfigurationService.ConfigLoadComplete
member.summary: Triggered when all dependencies have been downloaded and loaded into the program.

member.name: E:pkd_config_service.ConfigurationService.ConfigLoadFailed
member.summary: Triggered if there was a failure downloading dependencies or creating the Domain service.

member.name: P:pkd_config_service.ConfigurationService.Domain
member.summary: Gets the Domain hardware management service that was created from the configuration file.

member.name: M:pkd_config_service.ConfigurationService.LoadConfig
member.summary: Load all dependency information and create the Domain service. This will also attempt to download any missing dependencies from the ServerInfo data of the configuration file.
